span.p:
🏗️ GCP Infrastructure
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Google APIs
• VPC Network
• GKE Cluster
• Node Pool
• Network Security

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
⚙️ Kubernetes Base
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Namespace Creation
• ConfigMaps
• Service Configuration
• Environment Variables

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
📊 Monitoring
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Zipkin Deployment
• Zipkin Service
• Health Checks
• Tracing Setup

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
🚀 Microservices
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
• Service Discovery
• Cloud Config
• API Gateway
• Business Services
• Load Balancers

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
• container.googleapis.com
• compute.googleapis.com
• VPC + Subnet
• GKE Cluster
• Node Pool (1-3 nodes)

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
• ecommerce namespace
• ecommerce-config ConfigMap
• cloud-config-files ConfigMap
• Service URLs configuration

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
• Zipkin Deployment
• Zipkin LoadBalancer Service
• Health/Readiness Probes
• Resource Limits

div.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important; display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
• 10 Microservice Deployments
• 10 Kubernetes Services
• 3 LoadBalancer Services
• 7 ClusterIP Services
• Auto-scaling configuration
